content.html: Imagine I overpay for your company, fire your respected leadership and then tell you to do twice as much work for less comp. Then I offer you 3 months severance right before the holidays, or a stimulant-addled offer to "go hardcore." There's no equity. Why be a sucker?
content.value:
Imagine I overpay for your company, fire your respected leadership and then tell you to do twice as much work for less comp.

Then I offer you 3 months severance right before the holidays, or a stimulant-addled offer to "go hardcore."

There's no equity. Why be a sucker?
